answers.answer: XR is extended release. Usually taken once daily. You can read about XR here http://tinyurl.com/janumet-xr-pages

question: What is the difference between Janumet 50/1000 and Janumet XR 50/1000?  I am currently using Janumet 50/1000 twice daily....My prescription renewed last week and it is Janumet XR 50/1000.  What's the difference?
title: Diabetes Medication
